segments.text: How can she just stand there drying that stupid plate?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing like crazy, water all over the place!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's got one foot in the puddle and doesn't even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids are being total brats, sneaking cookies behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's stool is tilting; he's going to crash any minute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl just waits there like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole kitchen is a mess waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water damage on the cabinets? Unbelievable negligence.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is neat, but in here it's disgusting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They should know better than to leave the faucet running.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm fuming just watching this irresponsibility.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookies will be the least of their worries soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
